::Installation Steps::


1. Install the game.
2. Go to the folder of the game => NODVD install Steam through SteamSetup.exe.
3. From the folder NODVD choose a tablet for your processor and extract the 
files to the root folder of the game, along with the replacement.
4. Run Steam, authorization or entry in the account is not required, 
it is enough to Steam just been launched.
5. Adjust ENG Language from ini file or by downloading only content/en.7z from:
5. Start the game through the shortcut on the desktop.
